page.title: 16ECOLOGY & CONSERVATION
page.content: Originally small farms,60% of the land around Denton is farmed by 2 land_ owners.No organic fertilizers are used on the large wheat fields(miles of {hedges}removed)tractor & aerial spraying is frequently done.There are now(because of milk quotas)only 3 dairy herds of cows.The{Footpath} Society formed 2yrs ago,has re_opened some of the footpaths,many remain overgrown.Less cutting of road verges has encouraged resurgence of{wild {flowers,}including Early Purple & Spotted Orchids,consequently more moths & butterflies are seen.The water ways suffer high nitrate levels;toads, frogs,freshwater fish,kingfishers & herons now rarely seen.{Birds of Prey are increasing again due to more selective pesticides & more tolerant gamekeepers;as are rabbits after myx_ amatosis.We have a temperate climate.
